text: Donald Franciszek Tusk (, born 22 April 1957) is a Polish politician who is the current Prime Minister of Poland since 2023. He was prime minister before from 2007 to 2014. Before, he was the President of the European Council. He was the leader of the biggest Polish political party, Platforma Obywatelska (Civic Platform). In August 2014, Tusk was elected to become the next President of the European Council. In March 2017, Tusk was reelected as President of the European Council. On 11 December, Tusk was formally nominated to become Prime Minister for a second time, and assumed office on 13 December. ==References== ==Other websites== * Prime Minister | Council of Ministers | The Chancellery of the Prime Minister Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the European Council Category:Politicians from Gda≈Ñsk Category:Prime ministers of Poland Category:Current national leaders
title: Donald Tusk
